description: Migration adds tickets.ticket_origin column successfully in existing DB
Newly inserted tickets default ticket_origin to internal when not explicitly provided
Backfill marks tickets with email_metadata as inbound_email
Backfill marks tickets created by client users as client_portal when no email_metadata
Backfill marks unresolved legacy tickets as internal
TicketOrigin typecheck accepts internal/client_portal/inbound_email/api and rejects invalid values
MSP server action create path persists ticket_origin=internal
Client portal create path persists ticket_origin=client_portal
Inbound email create path persists ticket_origin=inbound_email
API create path persists ticket_origin=api
Workflow/automation ticket creation without explicit origin persists internal default
Resolver returns stored ticket_origin when present and valid
Resolver maps null legacy row with email_metadata to inbound_email
Resolver maps null legacy row with creator user_type client to client_portal
Resolver maps null legacy row with no signal to internal
Resolver handles unknown future origin values without crashing and returns safe fallback classification
MSP getTicketById payload includes normalized ticket_origin for internal ticket
MSP getTicketById payload includes normalized ticket_origin for client_portal ticket
MSP getTicketById payload includes normalized ticket_origin for inbound_email ticket
MSP getTicketById payload includes normalized ticket_origin for api ticket
Client portal getClientTicketDetails payload includes normalized ticket_origin for internal ticket
Client portal getClientTicketDetails payload includes normalized ticket_origin for client_portal ticket
Client portal getClientTicketDetails payload includes normalized ticket_origin for inbound_email ticket
Client portal getClientTicketDetails payload includes normalized ticket_origin for api ticket
TicketOriginBadge renders Created Internally label and data attribute for internal
TicketOriginBadge renders Created via Client Portal label and data attribute for client_portal
TicketOriginBadge renders Created via Inbound Email label and data attribute for inbound_email
TicketOriginBadge renders Created via API label and data attribute for api
TicketOriginBadge renders safe fallback label for unknown future origin value
MSP TicketDetails renders API origin badge when ticket_origin=api
MSP TicketDetails renders all other origin badges correctly (internal/client_portal/inbound_email)
Client portal TicketDetails renders API origin badge when ticket_origin=api
Client portal TicketDetails renders all other origin badges correctly (internal/client_portal/inbound_email)
English common locale includes ticket origin keys for internal/client_portal/inbound_email/api/other
English clientPortal locale includes ticket origin keys for internal/client_portal/inbound_email/api/other
Existing comment ResponseSourceBadge tests continue to pass after ticket-origin changes
Existing response-state badge behavior remains unchanged in MSP and client portal ticket details
End-to-end: API-created ticket displays Created via API badge in MSP ticket details
End-to-end: API-created ticket displays Created via API badge in client portal ticket details when ticket is visible to the client
